Package SimulationHandler

Class SimulationHandler

java.lang.Object
SimulationHandler.SimulationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimulationHandlerInterface
public class SimulationHandler extends Object implements SimulationHandlerInterface
SimulationHandler.java This class handles the simulation of events, managing the population and event container, updating statistics, and printing observations. Created on 01/06/2024
Since:
1.0
